about: In my early career, I've explored pioneering AI technologies, including GPTs, AI Avatars, and custom Large Language Models (LLMs), seeking innovative applications in web and mobile development, particularly on the frontend. My journey is driven by the desire to harness AI's transformative impact on product development and user experiences. I welcome everyone to connect and discuss our shared interests, whether they're tech-focused or not. Whether it's diving into the latest in AI, discussing software development, or sharing surf stories and planning a session together, I'm all ears!
